audio widget: The label for the audio widget.
Side audio: The label for the Side audio option.
Full size audio: The label for the Full size audio option.
Left aligned audio: The label for the Left aligned audio option.
Centered audio: The label for the Centered audio option.
Right aligned audio: The label for the Right aligned audio option.
Upload failed: The title of the notification displayed when upload fails.
Audio toolbar: The label used by assistive technologies describing an audio toolbar attached to an audio widget.
Resize audio: The label used for the dropdown in the audio toolbar containing defined resize options.
Resize audio to %0: The label used for the standalone resize options buttons in the audio toolbar.
Resize audio to the original size: The accessibility label of the standalone audio resize reset option button in the audio toolbar for screen readers.
Original: The default label for the resize option that resets the size of the audio.
Audio resize list: The accessibility label of the audio resize dropdown for screen readers.
Insert: The label of the form submit button if the audio source URL input has no value.
Update: The label of the form submit button if the audio source URL input has a value.
Insert audio via URL: The input label for the Insert audio via URL form.
Update audio URL: The input label for the Insert audio via URL form for a pre-existing audio.
The content of the tip below the Insert audio via URL form.
